page.title: 01TRELLECH AREA AS A WHOLE.
page.content: OUR BLOCK IS A MIXTURE OF FOREST AND FARMLAND, AND IS SOME 600 FEET ABOVE SEA-LEVEL, AND THE FOCAL POINT IS TRELLECH VILLAGE. IT IS A SMALL VILLAGE OF OLD AND NEW HOUSES, THROUGH WHICH RUNS THE B.4293 ROAD FROM CHEPSTOW TO MONMOUTH. THERE ARE TWO INNS CALLED THE CROWN INN, AND THE LION INN.THERE IS A DOCTOR'S SURGERY,AND A SMALL VILLAGE SCHOOL WITH 30 PUPILS,WHICH IS DUE TO CLOSE IN TWO YEARS TIME. THERE IS A VILLAGE STORE, AND POST OFFICE, AND THE VILLAGE IS DOMINATED BY THE GOTHIC CHURCH IN THE CENTRE. THE VILLAGE IS FAMOUS FOR IT'S STANDING STONES, AND THE VIRTUOUS WELL. MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE STONE BUILT,SOME AARE RENDERED, AND THERE IS A SMALL MODERN HOUSING ESTATE WITH 20 HOUSES.THE FARMS ARE MOSTLY LIVESTOCK_SHEEP,DAIRY AND BEEF CATTLE.
